docs.lead_paragraph: Drug, medical device and insurance companies give more than $100 million a year to nonprofit health-related groups that advise consumers and medical professionals, according to a report posted by The Chronicle of Philanthropy.

headline.main: Nonprofit Groups Detail Health Industry Funds

docs.abstract: Some nonprofits are offering details on how much money they receive from medical companies.
docs.snippet: Some nonprofits are offering details on how much money they receive from medical companies.

docs.lead_paragraph: A San Diego restaurant owner has been thrust into one of the nation’s most contentious debates, sending a current of fear through the restaurant industry.

headline.seo: Immigration Debate Steps Into the Kitchen
headline.main: Immigration Crackdown Steps Into the Kitchen
headline.print_headline: The Immigration Crackdown Steps Into the Kitchen

docs.snippet: A San Diego restaurant owner has been thrust into one of the nation’s most contentious debates, sending a current of fear through the restaurant industry.
